full_summary:
================
### Tender Announcement: EZ899-241741 - Phase 2 - Fraser Valley Institution Building K and F Roof Replacement

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4442418960-Doc4498046283
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4442418960
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 22, 2024, 14:00:00 (local time)
* **Contract Category:** Construction Services (CNST)

#### Project Overview

This Phase 2 solicitation is a follow-up to an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to participate in the bidding process for the roof replacement at the Fraser Valley Institution buildings K and F.

#### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** July 26, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

If you are a qualified supplier and require additional information or clarification on the solicitation, please contact:

Janie Leung (SPAC/PSPC)
janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice Requirements

Please note that this solicitation has expired. However, you can still access the solicitation document and related attachments through our website.

#### Important Notes

* This solicitation is a competitive process, and the contract will be awarded to the supplier with the lowest price based on the evaluation criteria.
* The end user entities responsible for the project are the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) and the Fraser Valley Institution.
* The Department of Public Works and Government Services is the contracting entity for this project.

Please do not hesitate to contact us if you require any further clarification or assistance.
